text: hi I'm Scott Becker from schrodinger
take 60 seconds to learn how in 60
minutes we help researchers get 16
million steps closer in the fight
against cancer at schrodinger we help
pharmaceutical researchers use physics
based simulations to virtually test
compounds as compute requirements become
an integral part of the drug discovery
process on-demand access to the latest
high-performance infrastructure allows
drug companies to be able to scale-up
and accelerate the process in much the
same way they've done through contract
research organizations for synthesis and
testing for example we helped one cancer
research team produce a list of tens of
millions of potential compounds down to
the thousand most likely to show signs
of partial efficacy the project required
high-end security to protect valuable
intellectual property it also required
an immense compute power with capacity
versus an order of magnitude more than
what we had in house so instead of tying
up our servers for a month we went to
Amazon Web Services fired up thousands
of highly scalable Intel Xeon processors
and were able to complete the job in a
few hours we securely and precisely
tested millions of virtual compounds per
hour putting researchers 16 million
steps closer to a potential new
treatment not bad for 60 minutes at work
you
